name: Horror Prototype (Pascal Lambert)
description:
This is a prototype of an Horror game made for class. My fifth project using Unity.

The game is played best with a keyboard and mouse. Please read the Readme file included with the project.

The .zip will contain a PDF file that contains spoilers for the events of the game and its puzzles. So I would suggest to read it after playing through the game to get the full experience.

Made by:

  • David Gregor - https://www.artstation.com/vlk - Art and Level Design
  • Eric Chan - Sounds and Level Design
  • Pascal Lambert - @pascall2 - Scripting
  • https://sites.google.com/view/pascal-lambert/home
  • “Sound effects obtained from https://www.zapsplat.com“
